author: James Walker
title: Jewish Colorado Governor Tears Up After GOP Leader Compares Stay-At-Home Order to Nazism
description: Gov. Jared Polis said he found the comparison offensive as a Jewish American who lost family in the Holocaust.
content:
Colorado Gov. Jared Polis choked up as he rebuked a local Republican's suggestion that his stay-at-home order would lead to a "Gestapo-like mentality" amid the coronavirus pandemic.
Polis said he was "offended by any comparison to Nazism" on Wednesday, notin… [+2337 chars]
